<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description          | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Set the title active | `boolean` | `false` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                               | Description        |
| ---------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `--c-list-item-title-color`        | Title color        |
| `--c-list-item-title-color-active` | Active title color |
